title: NEED HELP: Bloodmoon Jhin Cosplay/ Rifle Build
body:
Hey Guys! I'm looking into building a Blood Moon Jhin cosplay, I was wondering if anyone knew of a great place to find images to use as reference guides? I've already got the main stuff from the release, but if any of the Riot guys have concept art in high res I could get?

Thanks Guys!

replies.body:
I would suggest giving [LoLking model viewer](http://www.lolking.net/models?champion=202&skin=2) a try! You can zoom in and rotate jhin and see all the details. 

[Here's ](https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/002/509/617/large/jon-comoglio-bloodmoonjhin1.jpg?1462542169)a good closeup of his guns as well.
